about.title: About Us
about.paragraph1: Welcome to our healthcare website, your one-stop destination for reliable and comprehensive health care information. We are committed to promoting wellness and providing valuable resources to empower you on your health journey.

healthcard.title: Health Card Requirements & Digital Process
healthcard.important_notice_text: Before starting your HealthCardGo booking, you must first schedule and complete laboratory tests (Urinalysis, Fecalysis, Chest X-ray, and Hepa B if required) at an accredited lab to obtain your results.

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: The HealthCardGo: Panabo City Digital Booking System simplifies the issuance of health cards for workers. Instead of waiting in long lines, applicants can now book appointments online, upload requirements, and track their application status. This system ensures that every worker‚Äîfrom food handlers to medical professionals‚Äîis certified fit for work through a streamlined, organized process.

general_requirements.title: General Requirements (Digital Uploads)
general_requirements.subtitle: Applicants must prepare digital copies (clear photos or scans) of the following:

items.label: Digital Payment Confirmation
items.description: Receipt number from the City Treasurer's Office

items.requirements: Urinalysis, Stool Test, CBC (Complete Blood Count), Chest X-ray
Urinalysis, Stool Test, CBC (Complete Blood Count), Chest X-ray
Gram Stain, Hepatitis B Test, Syphilis Test, HIV Test

steps.description: Choose the type of Health Card you need (Food, Non-Food, or Pink Card) from the HealthCardGo portal.
If testing at CHO: Upload Laboratory Request Form, Payment Receipt, and Valid ID. If testing outside CHO: Upload Valid ID and confirm you have obtained lab results.
Select your preferred appointment date (available Monday, Tuesday, Thursday, Wednesday, Friday). Must be booked at least 7 days in advance.
Choose your preferred time block (Morning AM or Afternoon PM) based on available slots.
Review your appointment details and submit. CHO staff will verify your uploaded documents before confirming your appointment.

healthcard.footer: Panabo City Health Office (CHO) - HealthCardGo Digital Booking System

pregnancy.title: Prenatal Checkup

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: Consultation for expecting mothers to ensure the health of both mother and child. The Panabo City Health Office (CHO) strongly encourages pregnant mothers to complete eight (8) prenatal check-ups at their barangay health centers.

pregnancy.call_to_action: Take control of your health journey by booking your appointments every Tuesday. Our streamlined online and phone booking systems provide direct access to PhilHealth Konsulta and comprehensive maternity packages designed specifically for all Panabo residents.

items.description: Aim for at least eight visits. Use the CHO system to book every Tuesday.
Secure your maternal vaccinations during your scheduled Tuesday appointments.
For the safety of both mother and child, home births are strongly discouraged.
Access dental, labs, and nutrition counseling‚Äîall available on Tuesdays.
Full support including family planning. Book your Tuesday slot today.
